productos.nombre: API 602 Hydrofluoric Acid Alkylation Gate Valve
productos.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Threaded, socket weld, flanged, butt weld

caracteristicas: Fugitive emissions are a critical factorin the performance of any HF Acid valve and at Velan, we have been committed to reducing emissions beyond the industry standards, and providing the highest quality products to our customers for over 50 years. Velan offers a comprehensive line of Phillips and UOP approved API 602 gate, globe and check HF acid valves with several benefits.
Packing chamber has nickel overlay to protect from severe alkylation conditions and to guarantee low fugitive emissions.
Stem is made from solid age hardened K-Monel® 500 for increased strength and corrosion resistance.
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.

Body/bonnet threads and strength-weld: for welded bonnet valves, the bonnet is threaded-in and torqued to an engineered torque value and the body bonnet joint is strength-welded, offering double protection against leakage.
Repairable two-piece stem drive.
API 602 conventional port and full port designs available.
Wide variety of end connections as per client’s needs: flanged, BW, SW, NPT, weld stubs, including other types.
HF acid detecting paint allows for an immediate visual detection when exposed to acid or acid vapors to ensure valve integrity.

productos.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Threaded, Socket weld, Flanged, Butt weld

caracteristicas: Packing chamber has nickel overlay to protect from severe alkylation conditions and to guarantee low fugitive emissions.
Stem is made from solid age hardened K-Monel® 500 for increased strength and corrosion resistance.
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.

Body/bonnet threads and strength-weld: for welded bonnet valves, the bonnet is threaded-in and torqued to an engineered torque value and the body bonnet joint is strength-welded, offering double protection against leakage.
Fully guided wedge reduces wear on seating surfaces.
Repairable two-piece stem drive.
API 602 conventional port and full port designs available.
Standard stop globe design. Needle and flow control designs available upon request.
Wide variety of end connections as per client’s needs: flanged, BW, SW, NPT, weld stubs, including other types.

productos.nombre: API 602 Hydrofluoric Acid Alkylation Check Valve
productos.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Threaded, Socket weld, Flanged, Butt weld

caracteristicas: Available designs: spring actuated piston and ball, and swing check.
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.
Wide variety of end connections as per client’s needs: flanged, BW, SW, NPT, weld stubs, including other types.
Swing check non-rotating disc is fastened securely to disc hanger with a lock nut and cotter pin. All parts are accessible from top for easy servicing.
Cage unit design with no body penetration by hinge pin.
HF acid detecting paint allows for an immediate visual detection when exposed to acid or acid vapors to ensure valve integrity.

productos.nombre: Hydrofluoric Acid Alkylation Cast Carbon Steel and Monel® Gate Valve
productos.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.
caracteristicas: Packing chamber has nickel overlay to protect from severe alkylation conditions and to guarantee low fugitive emissions.
Stem is made from solid age hardened K-Monel® 500 for increased strength and corrosion resistance.
All of the critical areas of castings are of RT quality in accordance to B16.34.
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Monel® seats are single seal welded-in using state-of-the-art metallurgical technology to ensure zero leakage behind and around the seats, preventing in-service corrosion
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.
Body/bonnet wall thickness is in accordance to higher limits of API 600 offering one of the highest corrosion resistance capacities in the market.
HF acid detecting paint allows for an immediate visual detection when exposed to acid or acid vapors to ensure valve integrity
Fugitive emissions qualified to API 624 and ISO 15848-1
Flexible round wedge pioneered by Velan assures valve tightness and compensates for seat distortion and body deformation.

productos.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.
caracteristicas: Packing chamber has nickel overlay to protect from severe alkylation conditions and to guarantee low fugitive emissions.
Stem is made from solid age hardened K-Monel® 500 for increased strength and corrosion resistance.
All of the critical areas of castings are of RT quality in accordance to B16.34
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Monel® seat is single seal welded-in using state-of-the-art metallurgical technology to ensure zero leakage behind and around the seat, preventing in-service corrosion.
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.
Body/bonnet wall thickness is in accordance to higher limits of API 600/623 offering one of the highest corrosion resistance capacities in the market.

Unique non-rotating stem design is easily adaptable for actuation – with precision Acme threads and burnished finish. Valve suitable for horizontal installation.

caracteristicas: All of the critical areas of castings are of RT quality in accordance to B16.34
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Monel® seat is single seal welded-in using state-of-the-art metallurgical technology to ensure zero leakage behind and around the seat, preventing in-service corrosion.
